data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Bas-Uélé to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bas-Uélé, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Bas-Uélé.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Bas-Uélé, Democratic Republic of the Congo that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Bas-Uélé, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Bas-Uélé, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: There are 368,500 people living in the state of Bas-Uélé. Only about 70,834 might be believers.
Lord, make the 70,834 believers in Bas-Uélé to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 297,665 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.focus_label: Bas-Uélé, Democratic Republic of the Congo
